attributes.action: Free Prescriptions for Organ Transplant Recipients
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that people who receive life saving organ transplants and need daily medications to stay alive should receive them for free. Without medication they will die.
    What is the point of performing life saving surgery if people can then not afford to buy the prescribed medication?
    Other conditions receive free prescriptions as they are deemed life threatening. Without medication an organ transplant recipient will reject their new organ and ultimately die !
